title: 目標達成の後に・仕上げの修行！

text_block_list.text: Aiming to become a Triple Crown Umamusume, I've been working hard to raise my base level. I've also successfully achieved my goal of placing in a GⅠ race!
Matikanetannhauser, as a finishing touch, said she wanted to do her final training and headed to the mountains! I thought harsh training awaited her, but—

During the waterfall training, she was gently watched over by experienced people; during the mountain climbing, she got a hot pot soup delivery midway; and during the running, she joined in with the girls' volleyball club...
It turned out much more relaxed than expected, but it was a day where I felt her personality—wherever she goes, she quickly fits right into the group.
Once spring comes, it's finally time for the 'Satsuki Sho'! I want to get serious and prepare for it!
